mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_power sp LEFT JOIN sys_role_power srp ON sp.power_id = srp.power_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.role_id = srp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.user_id = sur.user_id WHERE su.username = #{username} and sp.enable = 1 ORDER BY sp.sort ASC
